newsitem.title: EGYPT: Interbank Egypt average pound 3.3865/3.3911 to dlr.
newsitem.headline: Interbank Egypt average pound 3.3865/3.3911 to dlr.

text.p: Private sector Cairo banks quoted the dollar at 3.3840 to 3.3890 pounds bid and 3.3850 to 3.3980 pounds offered in the interbank market on Sunday.
A survey of four actively trading banks gave average rates of 3.3865 pounds bid and 3.3911 pounds offered. The averages compared with Thursday's 3.3858 and 3.3890 pounds.
The Central Bank calculated the average exchange rate at midday (1000 GMT) at 3.390564 buy and 3.397487 sell. -- Cairo newsroom +20 2 578 3290/1
